snippet.title: Fallen Legion: Rise to Glory - Spotlight Trailer (PS5, Xbox, PC) (EU - English)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ https://fallenlegiongame.com/collection/

Fallen Legion: Rise to Glory unites the story of Fallen Legion: Flames of Rebellion and Fallen Legion: Sins of an Empire into one thrilling title. Take up the mantle of battle as either Princess Cecille and Legatus Laendur. Will you restore the kingdom to its former glory or raise a new nation in its place? The choice is yours!

Fallen Legion: Rise to Glory / Fallen Legion Revenants comes to PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC on 26 August 2022!

#FallenLegion #yummyyummytummy
